about_the_game:
V-Aria – a journey through the Bayerische Staatsoper

Immerse yourself for three minutes in the scintillating world of opera! On a red velvet chair from Munich's Nationaltheater you'll travel with the aid of VR glasses through the opera house, meeting musicians, dancers and magnificent singers. You'll also discover wonderful music, splendid halls and bizarre figures. You'll travel to places which would otherwise be out of bounds, singers give you a private performance on the stage, and at the end you personally receive the applause of more than 2,000 viewers. Bravo!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Win 7, 8, 10 or newer
  • Processor: i7 or newer
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC
  • Additional Notes: Video not playing indicates missing HEVC codec for your computer-setup
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10 or newer
  • Processor: i7 or newer
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM

  • Additional Notes: Video not playing indicates missing HEVC codec for your computer-setup
